org.apache.struts.webapp.example2.memory

Class MemoryUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.struts.webapp.example2.memory.MemoryUser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    User

    public final class MemoryUser
extends java.lang.Object
implements User

    Concrete implementation of User for an in-memory database backed by an XML data file.

    Since:
    Struts 1.1
    Version:
    $Rev$ $Date$
    Author:
    Craig R. McClanahan
